appDescription: Create, manipulate, and understand geometric shapes interactively
selectShapeToViewMeasurements: Select a shape to view measurements
holdShiftToSnap15Degrees: Hold Shift to snap to 15° increments when rotating

circle.radius: The distance from the center to the edge of the circle.
circle.diameter: The distance across the circle through the center.
circle.perimeter: The distance around the circle, also called circumference.
circle.circumference: The distance around the circle, equal to 2πr or πd.

rectangle.width: The horizontal dimension of the rectangle.
rectangle.height: The vertical dimension of the rectangle.
rectangle.diagonal: The straight-line distance between opposite corners of the rectangle.

triangle.side1: The length of one of the sides of the triangle.
triangle.side2: The length of one of the sides of the triangle.
triangle.side3: The length of one of the sides of the triangle.
triangle.perimeter: The distance around the triangle (sum of all sides).
triangle.height: The perpendicular distance from a vertex to the longest side (used as base).
triangle.angles: The sum of the interior angles of a triangle is always 180 degrees.
triangle.angle1: The angle between side3 and side2. When one angle changes, the others adjust to maintain a sum of 180°.
triangle.angle2: The angle between side1 and side3. When one angle changes, the others adjust to maintain a sum of 180°.
triangle.angle3: The angle between side1 and side2. When one angle changes, the others adjust to maintain a sum of 180°.

line.length: The straight-line distance between the two endpoints.
line.angle: The angle the line makes with the horizontal axis, measured in degrees.

tooltips.lineExplanation: Calculates the straight-line distance between two points
tooltips.calibrateDescription: Adjust screen calibration for accurate physical measurements
tooltips.coarseAdjustment: Coarse adjustment: make larger changes to calibration
tooltips.fineAdjustment: Fine adjustment: make smaller changes to calibration
tooltips.zoomIn: Zoom in to view more detail
tooltips.zoomOut: Zoom out to view more of the graph
tooltips.clearDescription: Remove all shapes from the canvas

clickOnCurveInstruction: Click on the curve to select a point and view its information.
scaleFactorHint: Adjust the scale factor to stretch or compress the graph vertically
functionExpressionHint: Use x as the variable, e.g. x*x, Math.sin(x), etc.
naturalLanguagePlaceholder: Describe the function in natural language, e.g., 'a parabola that opens upward' or 'sine wave with period of 2π'
naturalLanguageDescription: Use natural language or pseudocode to describe the function you want to create. OpenAI will convert it to a mathematical expression.

openai.title: OpenAI API Settings
openai.description: Configure your OpenAI API key for natural language processing
openai.apiKeyHint: Your API key is stored locally and encrypted. It is never sent to our servers.

calibration.title: Screen Calibration
calibration.description: Calibrate your screen for accurate physical measurements
calibration.instructions: Your screen may not display measurements at their actual physical size. Use this tool to calibrate your display for accurate measurements.
calibration.placeRuler: Place a physical ruler or measuring tape against your screen and adjust the line below until it matches exactly
calibration.lineDescription: This line should be exactly {length} {unit} long

developer.title: Developer Settings
developer.description: Advanced settings for development and debugging
developer.loggingDescription: Enable or disable console logging with timestamps

units.title: Measurement Units
units.description: Configure the units used for measurements in this canvas

sharePanel.title: Share
sharePanel.description: Configure layout and options for sharing

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Choose how your canvas will be displayed when shared
layout.defaultDescription: Full interactive canvas with all controls

options.title: Options
options.description: Configure which UI elements are visible
options.funcOnlyDescription: Hide geometry tools, show only function plotting
options.headerDescription: Show app title and description header

url.title: Share Link
url.description: Copy this URL to share your canvas

embed.title: Embed Code
embed.description: Use this HTML code to embed the canvas in your website
